West_Jordan.Jordan High School (Sandy, Utah):
Jordan High School in Sandy, Utah, United States was established in 1905.


== Timeline ==


=== 1907 - 1914 ===
Jordan High School took root when a student body of just seven students led by Weston Morley began meeting in the basement of a church in Midvale. His small group began to grow in numbers and began to give him money.
